# Topic 01 — 通知/告示：介绍 + 邀请

## Directions (要求)

<Bilingual cn="你的大学将为新来的留学生举办一个欢迎晚会。请以学生会的名义写一份通知（或告示），以便：">Your university is going to host a welcome party for new international students. Write a notice (or an announcement) in the name of the Students’ Union to</Bilingual>

1.  <Bilingual cn="简要介绍晚会，以及">briefly introduce the party, and</Bilingual>
2.  <Bilingual cn="邀请留学生参加。">invite the international students to join it.</Bilingual>

<Bilingual cn="你应该在答题纸上写100个单词左右。">You should write about 100 words on the ANSWER SHEET.</Bilingual>

<Bilingual cn="不要用你自己的名字。用“The Students’ Union”代替。(10分)">Do not use your own name. Use “The Students’ Union” instead. (10 points)</Bilingual>

<br/>

## ✏️ 参考范文

<Bilingual cn="通知/告示">Notice/Announcement</Bilingual>
<br/>
<Bilingual cn="6月10日，周五">Friday, June 10</Bilingual>

<p><Bilingual cn="很高兴得知各位留学生已经报到。本通知/告示旨在邀请各位参加欢迎会。">It is so great to hear that you, international students, have arrived at our university. This notice/announcement is for the purpose of inviting you to attend a welcome party.</Bilingual></p>

<p><Bilingual cn="首先，欢迎会定于6月20日19:00在学生活动中心举行，时长约2小时。">To begin with, the party is scheduled to start at 19:00 on June 20 in the Center of Students’ Activities and last for approximately two hours.</Bilingual> <Bilingual cn="此外，欢迎会的特色是活动精彩丰富，包括唱歌、跳舞、中国文化介绍和趣味比赛。">In addition, this party is characterized by a variety of interesting activities, including singing, dancing, Chinese culture introduction, and fun competitions.</Bilingual> <Bilingual cn="当然，欢迎会上还会提供一些中国传统小吃。">Of course, some traditional Chinese snacks will be served at the party.</Bilingual></p>

<p><Bilingual cn="总之，建议你们参加这次欢迎会，它将带给你们结交新朋友的机会，激发你们对校园生活的热情，并帮助你们更好地了解中国。">To conclude, it is advisable for you to participate in this party, which will bring you opportunities to make friends, arouse your passion for the campus life, and help you know China better.</Bilingual></p>

<p><Bilingual cn="最后，期待你们的参与。">Finally, we are looking forward to your participation.</Bilingual></p>

<Bilingual cn="学生会">The Students’ Union</Bilingual>
